title: Atomoxetine
summary: Atomoxetine, sold under the brand name Strattera, among others, is a medication used to treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD).[7] It may be used alone or along with psychostimulants.[8][9] Use of atomoxetine is only recommended for those who are at least six years old.[7] It is taken by mouth.[7] It was approved for medical use in the United States in 2002.[7] In 2018, it was the 162nd most commonly prescribed medication in the United States, with more than 3Â million prescriptions.[10][11]
